text: @DevinNunes @seanhannity What would really help me & my family is for the crd card, banks, mortgage & car companies to suspend payments due, for 4to5 months until this coronavirus is under control & allow me to keep the cash that I have now& then the money from the govrmt will certainly help sustain us

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
